description: Manage Azure Resource Manager template deployment at subscription scope.

commands.name: az deployment sub cancel
commands.summary: Cancel a deployment at subscription scope.

commands.name: az deployment sub create
commands.summary: Start a deployment at subscription scope.
commands.syntax:
az deployment sub create --location
                         [--confirm-with-what-if]
                         [--handle-extended-json-format]
                         [--name]
                         [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                         [--no-wait]
                         [--parameters]
                         [--proceed-if-no-change]
                         [--query-string]
                         [--template-file]
                         [--template-spec]
                         [--template-uri]
                         [--what-if]
                         [--what-if-exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                         [--what-if-result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
examples: az deployment sub create --location WestUS --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json

az deployment sub create --location WestUS --template-file azuredeploy.json  \
    --parameters '{ \"policyName\": { \"value\": \"policy2\" } }'

az deployment sub create --location WestUS --template-file azuredeploy.json  \
    --parameters @params.json --parameters https://mysite/params.json --parameters MyValue=This MyArray=@array.json

commands.name: az deployment sub delete
commands.summary: Delete a deployment at subscription scope.

commands.name: az deployment sub export
commands.summary: Export the template used for a deployment.

commands.name: az deployment sub show
commands.summary: Show a deployment at subscription scope.

commands.name: az deployment sub validate
commands.summary: Validate whether a template is valid at subscription scope.
examples: az deployment sub validate --location westus2 --parameters MyValue=This MyArray=@array.json --template-file azuredeploy.json

commands.name: az deployment sub wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a deployment condition is met.

commands.name: az deployment sub what-if
commands.summary: Execute a deployment What-If operation at subscription scope.
commands.syntax:
az deployment sub what-if --location
                          [--exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                          [--name]
                          [--no-pretty-print]
                          [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                          [--parameters]
                          [--query-string]
                          [--result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
                          [--template-file]
                          [--template-spec]
                          [--template-uri]
examples: az deployment sub what-if --location WestUS --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json
az deployment sub what-if --location WestUS --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --result-format ResourceIdOnly
az deployment sub what-if --location WestUS --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --no-pretty-print
